faq.title: Frequently asked
faq.subtitle: We answer your most common questions about Frutia

q1.question: Does Frutia replace a nutritionist?
q1.answer: Frutia is designed to accompany you daily with planning, tracking and nutritional education. For specific medical conditions and/or physical changes (gaining muscle or losing fat) it's ideal to complement it with constant monitoring.

q2.question: What if I don't have certain foods?
q2.answer: You can work with options and substitutions. The idea is to adapt to what you have available.

q3.question: Can I use it if I have restrictions (lactose-free, etc.)?
q3.answer: Yes. The app can adapt options and suggestions according to your preferences/restrictions.

q4.question: How does Frutia handle when I 'go off' the plan?
q4.answer: It proposes realistic adjustments for the rest of the day (without punishments), to maintain progress.

q5.question: Can I export my plan?
q5.answer: Yes: history and PDF download (ideal for coaches or for your own tracking).
